description: This file is the main application component for a React-based frontend of a Tic Tac Toe game. It manages routing between different screens (Home, Game, Settings) and provides context providers for theme and routing logic.

classes.name: RouterOutlet
classes.description: A memoized React component that renders the appropriate screen based on the current route and constructs navigation objects.

methods.name: App
methods.description: The main application component wrapping everything inside ThemeProvider and InternalRouter.
